original_text: I did not come into the world so that everyone will agree with each other. No, I tell you. I came to put people against one another.
korean_text: 내가 세상에 화평을 주려고 온 줄로 아느냐 내가 너희에게 이르노니 아니라 도리어 분쟁하게 하려 함이로라

sentences.original_text: I did not come into the world
so that everyone will agree with each other
I came to put people against one another
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사람들이 서로 대적하게 하려고 왔습니다
